title: EcoStep
subTitle: A Sustainable E-commerce Platform for Eco-Friendly Products
projectDescription: EcoStep is a full-stack B2B/B2C e-commerce platform focused on promoting eco-friendly and sustainable products. The platform allows users to browse, purchase, and manage green products while providing secure authentication, role-based access, and a smooth user experience. It is designed to support both customers and administrators with modern web technologies.
keyFeatureDescription: Implemented secure user authentication using Firebase and JWT, including role-based access for users and admins.
Admins can add, update, and delete products, while users can browse products with detailed information and categories.
Integrated secure order management with protected routes to ensure only authorized users can place and view orders.
Built a fully responsive and user-friendly interface using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Swiper Slider for enhanced UX.
challengesFacedDescription: Managing JWT-based authentication alongside Firebase authentication and securing API routes was initially complex.
Handling shared state between multiple components and ensuring consistent data flow required careful component design.
improvements: Add an advanced analytics dashboard for admins
Integrate a full payment gateway like Stripe

title: InfraFix
subTitle: An Infrastructure Issue Reporting and Management Platform
projectDescription: InfraFix is a full-stack web application designed to report, track, and manage infrastructure-related issues efficiently. The platform enables users to submit issues with detailed descriptions, while administrators can monitor, update, and resolve reports through a secure and scalable system. It focuses on real-time data handling, performance optimization, and a seamless user experience.
keyFeatureDescription: Implemented secure role-based authentication using Firebase and JWT to control access for users and administrators.
Users can submit infrastructure issues, track their status, and view updates in real time.
Integrated TanStack Query for efficient data fetching, caching, and background synchronization.
Developed a responsive admin dashboard for managing reported issues using React.js and Tailwind CSS.
challengesFacedDescription: Ensuring up-to-date issue data across multiple views while minimizing unnecessary API calls required careful TanStack Query configuration.
Protecting sensitive admin routes and validating JWT tokens consistently across the server posed initial challenges.
improvements: Implement issue prioritization and severity levels
Introduce user feedback and resolution ratings

title: StudyPal
subTitle: A Smart Study Management and Collaboration Platform
projectDescription: StudyPal is a full-stack study management and collaboration platform built to help students organize their study materials, track progress, and collaborate effectively. The application provides a clean, modern interface with secure authentication and scalable backend services, focusing on productivity, accessibility, and performance.
keyFeatureDescription: Implemented secure user authentication using Firebase, allowing users to safely access personalized study data.
Users can create, update, and organize study resources such as notes, tasks, and study plans.
Integrated progress tracking features to help users monitor their learning goals and study consistency.
Built a responsive and performant interface using Next.js and Tailwind CSS for an optimized user experience.
challengesFacedDescription: Handling authentication flows alongside Next.js server-side rendering required careful configuration and testing.
Maintaining consistent and up-to-date study data across multiple routes and components was initially challenging.
improvements: Introduce role-based access for tutors or mentors
